fields_of_study: Machine learning concepts, algorithms and frameworks (e.g., Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch)

description:
esigning, building, and deploying AI systems that can learn from data. Key duties include cleaning and preparing data, developing and testing models, optimizing performance, and integrating them into applications for real-world use. This role requires strong programming skills (often in Python) and a solid foundation in math, statistics, and machine learning frameworks.

responsibilities: Designing, building and deploying AI systems that can learn from data.
Handling data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data cleaning to prepare datasets for model training
Developing machine learning models using various frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch
Deploying models into production, build scalable ML pipelines, implement monitoring and retraining strategies to maintain performance
